page.title: 20Shanklin C.E.Primary School
page.content: All the children of class 4 and class 5,aged between 7 and 9,took part in the Domesday Project between May and July 1985.It was the major work of the summer term.The children,a group of 60,were taken on 2 walks around the area.The first around the coast the second over the hills.They then divided into interest groups for the study.The parents came to a meeting and the project was described,many offered to help.The groups planned their own field work and invited parents to go with them,other parents became familiar with the computer and helped the children type in their work,95%of the work was done by the children.At the end of the project invited their parents and all those that had helped to an exhibition of work.{All enjoyed the Project,we have {all learned much. }
